plots.content: Plotted Spirals 'Silver & Gold Amour on Red' is a co-signed from from the Plottable Spirals generator. collaboration with Arthur Simony.

data.title: Plotted Spirals 'Silver & Gold Amour on Red'

plots.content: Plotted Spirals 'White Amour on Red' is a co-signed from from the Plottable Spirals generator. collaboration with Arthur Simony.
This is a physical counterpart of a NFT from the Plottable Spirals collection released on fx(hash) on September 2023. This plot was released through the "Redeemables" beta feature of fx(hash).
